description.displayText: Dana is so nurturing and patient! Our girls love her. I love how she was willing to have fun and be silly with and encourage our girls to step out of their comfort zone. Our home was always spotless when we came back and the kids were always to bed on time! She communicates very well and pays attention to our kids needs, instead of just being a "play datemate" for them. We've miss her so much since moving back to Utah. She is a keeper!
